properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REFUND JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RF_RESER_NO = RESER_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT RF_RESER_NO, MEM_ID, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE FROM TB_REFUND JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RESER_NO = RF_RESER_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY RF_RESER_NO, MEM_ID, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE ORDER BY RF_RESER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, REFUND_NAME, BANK, REFUND_ACC_NO, REFUND_PRICE, TO_CHAR(RESER_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD')"RESER_DATE" FROM TB_REFUND JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RF_RESER_NO = RESER_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM ON (TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL ON (TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE RESER_NO = ? GROUP BY HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, REFUND_NAME, BANK, REFUND_ACC_NO, REFUND_PRICE, TO_CHAR(RESER_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD')
